page.title: 16Businesses in Bishop Monkton
page.content: There are several small family businesses in Bishop Monkton in addition to farms. These are: 1.Post Office and shop, 2.General store, 3.Garage with full service and maintenance facilities with attached shop selling motor spares, DIY material and tools and a comprehensive range pf plant and flower seeds etc, 4.Agricultural engineer, 5.2 painters and decorators, 6.Joiner and undertaker, 7.Ladies hairdresser, 8.Builder, 9.Coal merchant, 10.2 market gardeners one specialising in trees and shrubs the other in flowers plants and vegetables, 11.Sign writer, 12.Mobile disco.
